attributes.action: Ease quarantine rules for redlist countries for those who are fully vaccinated
attributes.additional_details:
I am a dual citizen of UK and srilanka, having the need to visit srilanka to see my old aged parents who require support during the pandemic. As I am unable to visit them for nearly 2 .5 years, Now I am planning to leave in July but  when I enter UK I need to quarantine for 10 days in hotel even though I am fully vaccinated.

There are many people out there in UK who are in similar situation who had a essential reason to travel redlist country and unable to do so due to the long quarantine period imposed for the redlist countries.
attributes.background: test to release scheme should be an option for the fully vaccinated British arriving from a red list countries
